import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import logo from'../../assets/img/logo-white.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ComingSoonArea=()=>{// Custom Timer
const[timerDays,setTimerDays]=useState('00');const[timerHours,setTimerHours]=useState('00');const[timerMinutes,setTimerMinutes]=useState('00');const[timerSeconds,setTimerSeconds]=useState('00');let interval=useRef();const startTimer=()=>{const countdownDate=new Date('August 19 2022 00:00:00').getTime();interval=setInterval(()=>{const now=new Date().getTime();const distance=countdownDate-now;const days=Math.floor(distance/(1000*60*60*24));const hours=Math.floor(distance%(1000*60*60*24)/(1000*60*60));const minutes=Math.floor(distance%(1000*60*60)/(1000*60));const seconds=Math.floor(distance%(1000*60)/1000);if(distance<0){// stop Our Timer
clearInterval(interval.current);}else{// update Timer
setTimerDays(days);setTimerHours(hours);setTimerMinutes(minutes);setTimerSeconds(seconds);}},1000);};useEffect(()=>{startTimer();});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"coming_soon_area",className:"ptb-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-8 offset-lg-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"coming_soon_content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"coming_soon_title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"We Are Coming Soon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"coming_soon_time",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"countdown_soon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerDays}),"days"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerHours}),"Hours"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerMinutes}),"Minutes"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:timerSeconds}),"Seconds"]})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"coming_soon_newsletter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Subscribe for our next update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:e=>{e.preventDefault();Swal.fire('Success','Thank you for your Subscribtion','success');},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Your Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"theme-btn-one btn-black-overlay btn_md",children:"subscrib"})]})})]})]})})})})})});};export default ComingSoonArea;
